note.para: Note that you should be already familiar with Zend Framework1 and ZendFramework2, Symfony1 and 2, Doctrine2 and PHPUnit since this library is built using those frameworks. Moreover, Zend Framework terms are mostly used in this documentation without explicitely defining what they do since it is expectedto be already known by the reader. For example, Zend_Application is used, but not described on how to configure it, only how to use Majisti\Application.
